business: Runs the schools that teach medicine and houses of healing that provide both mundane and magical services
characteristics: One can be healed...for the right price
Those with the gold can be healed with spells. Those less wealthy are healed with mundane medicine and techniques
There are rumors that house Jorasco engaged in disturbing experiments during the Last War, working with House Vadalis to develop biological weapons and strange new creatures
prompts: Are you a part of House Jorasco? If so, do you bear the Mark of Healing? Or do you bear the Mark without being a member of the House?
If you are in the house, what is your role? What is your opinion of the House?
Where you exiled from your house?
How do you use your mark if you have one?
How much of a stickler are you about healing others for altruistic purposes instead of gold?
Did you help heal others during the Last War?
